attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel it would be helpful to know now what the goverment intends to do to help those of us on limited incomes to pay the increased gas & elec prices.
My Direct Debit with E'on has increased from £47 to £81 monthly.  My husband is a RAF WW2 veteran, I am a retired tutor.  Life is going to be very difficult this winter.  It would be good to know what the plans are, in order to ease the worry we, and lots of others in a similar situation, have.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
